title: All Ball - Pt. 2: George Mason HC Kim English on Steph/LeBron Play-In, Buy-In, Transition to Coaching
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt. 2: George Mason HC Kim English on Steph/LeBron Play-In, Buy-In, Transition to Coaching
description:
In this episode, Doug concludes his two part interview with George Mason Head Basketball Coach Kim English by discussing the LeBron/Steph play-in thriller, when he finally bought into an unselfish philosophy as a player, his transition to coaching under Frank Haith at Tulsa, Tad Boyle at Colorado, Rick Barnes at Tennessee and his head coaching philosophy as he heads into his first year as the man at George Mason. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
